meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of dimers.
meanings.sent1: The dimeric molecule showed a strong bond between its two parts.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the dimeric structure of the compound under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The dimeric puzzle pieces fit perfectly together, forming a complete picture.
meanings.sent4: Her dimeric personality traits, both introverted and extroverted, made her unique.
meanings.sent5: The dimeric relationship between the two characters added depth to the story.

meanings.definition: Having a molecular structure composed of two identical monomers.
meanings.sent1: The dimeric bond between the atoms was incredibly strong.
meanings.sent2: The polymer chain consisted of multiple dimeric units linked together.
meanings.sent3: The dimeric twins dressed alike and often confused their friends.
meanings.sent4: The dimeric nature of the melody repeated throughout the song, creating a harmonious tune.
meanings.sent5: The dimeric design of the building mirrored itself on both sides, creating a symmetrical look.
